Public Remarks: Modern day problems cant follow you home when you live in a 1912 craftsman. As soon as you cross the deep porch & close the handcrafted door behind you, office concerns fade away. Here at home, bosses cant reach you after 5pm. In fact, by 5:02 youll be on the porch with your feet up, Sidecar swirling in your hand. Or maybe youre sitting by the brick fireplace in the living room with a book you pulled from the built-ins. For a refill, walk through the original paned pocket doors into the formal dining room, adorned with wainscoting & a built-in buffet. Through the butlers door awaits the sizable kitchen - but youre heading beyond that, to the cellar (AKA, your modern-day speakeasy). Take the soiree outside to your landscaped backyard, which also leads to the ADU (perfect for a rental or in law unit). When youre ready to face the modern world again, youre only a few blocks from Downtown Willow Glen & all of the conveniences of Silicon Valley. Or maybe, stay for one more sip.

Great backyard for entertaining or relaxing. Oversized 1-car garage. Quarter basement. Walk to Lincoln Ave with its restaurants, wine and coffee bars, and shops, Walking/biking trail just steps away. A short drive to downtown San Jose. Easy commute. Open Sat/Sun.

Public Remarks: This exceptional multi-level custom craftsman home in Willow Glen leaves no stone unturned when it comes to stunning architectural details and maximizing indoor/outdoor California living. With the interior hallway and exterior loggia running front-to-back, entry is a feast for the eyes as you take in the formal living room with its stunning fireplace and built-in pass through to the formal dining room with tray ceiling. A gourmet chefs kitchen with granite counters, custom tile, and island with seating showcases the multiple points of access to the beautiful covered loggia. A separate den with balcony and built-ins overlooks the backyard. The sumptuous primary retreat includes a seating area, a vaulted ceiling, gas fireplace, custom walk-in closet, and spa-like bath. Three additional upstairs bedrooms share a full hallway bath plus a walk-out basement bedroom accesses its own full bath. Optimal Willow Glen location near everything. A turnkey must-see!

Public Remarks: Located just minutes away from the vibrant heart of Willow Glen on a serene tree-lined street, this charming Tudor home offers the perfect blend of classic aesthetics and modern comforts. Abundant natural light, french doors, plantation shutters, and hardwood floors exude a sense of timeless elegance from the moment you walk in. Continue outside to discover blooming gardens and secluded patios, perfect for alfresco dining, entertaining friends and family, or simply relaxing with a good book. Originally built in 1939, this efficiently designed home has been tastefully upgraded over the years, seamlessly blending its classic style with contemporary conveniences. Dont miss the secret garden beyond the garage, where youll find even more space for growing fruits and vegetables, outdoor projects, storage, or potential expansion. With its tight-knit welcoming community and enviable location, you will love living 6 short blocks from Lincoln Avenue and within minutes of local parks, schools, shopping, dining, entertainment, outdoor recreation, and transportation.

Public Remarks: Utterly charming 2BR/1BA home + insulated and finished shed used as an office, beautifully updated, on a large lot with a wonderful backyard designed for enjoying life! Inside, there are original hardwood floors, arched openings to the living room and dining room. The living room boasts a huge picture window framing the front yard view, and the dining room is graced by a grand wood and metal chandelier. Updated kitchen has quartz countertops and painted shaker-style cabinets with copper pulls, pantry cupboard with pullouts, wood flooring and recessed lighting. Both bedrooms have windows overlooking the backyard and deep, functional closets. A door with diffused glass pane opens into the recently updated bathroom, complete with rectangular tile floor, wide vanity, and combination tub/shower. Theres another windowed door between the kitchen and laundry room leads from the laundry room to the fabulous backyard. Along with a marvelous cabana, large lawn area, and raised garden beds (planted with vegetables and herbs), theres also an insulated/finished shed! Landscape plants include citrus trees, roses, lavender, rosemary, blue agave and blue potato bushes. Across the street from Fuller Park and the light rail line, this home is truly a charmer!

Conveniently situated just a mile from downtown Willow Glen, this home offers easy access to local eateries, shops, and major highways 280, 87, and Diridon Station. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this your new home!

Public Remarks: This delightful Victorian home in Willow Glen has been beautifully renovated and showcases stunning and unique designs you won't want to miss! As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a sunlit living room with a picturesque view of the street through the bay window. The lovely hardwood floors will lead you to the 3 spacious bedrooms, the dining area, and the newly remodeled kitchen which features a french door that seamlessly blends the indoor and the outdoor. The spacious backyard is adorned with lush green plants and a cozy sitting area, perfect for a playset or a fire pit for family fun or entertaining guests. A beautiful walnut tree spreads its gorgeous branches over the lawn providing shade all through the summer months. The most surprising and distinctive feature of this home is the full basement! This extra space can be utilized as a family room, kids' play area, storage, or even a woodshop. Additionally, the newly custom-built shed in the backyard is an ideal space for a small office or additional storage. Conveniently located in a friendly and safe neighborhood, this home is just minutes away from Willow Glen downtown and is close to work, freeway, parks, and schools! Don't miss this opportunity to call this place your new home!

Public Remarks: Beautiful home with thoughtful details on quiet cul-de-sac in the heart of quaint Willow Glen, a neighborhood known for tree-lined streets, historic homes, & thriving small businesses. You'll love the lush front yard & welcoming living room with custom sliding screen to cover TV, cozy gas fireplace, & built-in display cases perfect for treasures! The kitchen boasts high-end stainless steel appliances, white quartz counters, custom cabinetry, & skylight. Primary bedroom is a true retreat with walk-in closet with custom shelving; guest bedroom has walk-in closet & private patio. Upgraded bathrooms, one with high-end toilet & luxurious shower, the other with gorgeous basin sink. Lovely backyard with brick-paved seating area, verdant lawn, & large, shaded side yard. Upgrades include dual pane windows, copper plumbing, tankless water heater & water softener, owned solar panels, & stunning custom woodwork. Students have access to top local schools: Willow Glen Elementary, Willow Glen Middle, & Willow Glen High (buyer to verify)!

Public Remarks: Nestled in the wonderful Willow Glen community, this charming cottage sits on a beautiful tree-lined street amongst many charming homes and just a stroll away from downtown Willow Glen and close to the 280 freeway and downtown San Jose. Relax on your inviting covered front porch or bask in the spacious backyard with yummy peach and citrus trees. Inside, you'll find newly refinished wood floors, new plush carpet and fresh paint. Custom-built cabinets, coved ceilings, a cozy fireplace, breakfast nook, indoor laundry and a welcoming, bright and sunny atmosphere complete this perfect picture. The oversized two-car garage offers ample storage and an attached covered patio for outdoor enjoyment. Good storage in the nice sized basement. Long driveway with lots of parking , newer fence and very possibly great opportunity to build an ADU. This is a lovely neighborhood. Your Willow Glen dream home awaits!

Public Remarks: Enjoy the architectural charm of this Craftsman cutie, circa 1908 w/ custom, high-end modern amenities! The living room is rich w/ dark wood casings, pocket doors, Room & Board bookcases, & corner window seat. The sophisticated gourmet kitchen boasts custom soft-close drawers, suede-finish counters, Thermador appliances & Bicycle Glass pedant lights. Natural light abounds through the great room & dining area, showing off the stunning hardwood floors & soaring ceilings. The bathrooms are tastefully remodeled w/ designer tile & chrome fixtures. A large, 3rd bedroom, currently being used as a family room, opens up to the back deck & thoughtfully landscaped backyard, leading to the garage w/ workshop. The Basement adds 800 SF of space, currently being used for an office, exercise & laundry area w/ Miele washer & dryer. Situated on a tree-lined street, close to the downtown Willow Glen & Hummingbird Park. You'll be thrilled by this impeccably maintained, luxurious Willow Glen home!

Confidential Remarks: Offers presented as received. Please call Brett with questions and let me know how I can be of help to you and your clients.
Public Remarks: Impeccably restored and improved 125 year old Victorian available just in time for spring and summer strolls along Willow Glen's The Ave, with its many boutique shops and award-winning restaurants only blocks away. For evenings not spent downtown, Fisk's kitchen offers all the tools to prepare your own gourmet meal: stainless steel Viking oven, Fisher-Paykel 5-burner gas range w/ custom Vent-a-Hood, tiled backsplash w/pot filler, warming drawer, custom Hickory cabinets that soar to the 10' ceiling, providing ample pantry and storage space for all your niche spices and ingredients. In addition to carefully restoring the breathtaking polychromatic exterior paint that highlights the many Victorian architectural details, in 2019 owner replaced the roof (w/permits), furnace, and (central) a/c, installed a green thermostat, and extensively renovated the full hallway bathroom. Sunset Magazine worthy backyard perfected in 2021, with two stunning, connected paver patios installed along w/ new landscaping with water-efficient irrigation station. Also in 2021, permitted 120-square foot office (potential additional tax deduction for business owners) built with heat, a/c, T5 Internet, and large windows and glass French doors luring light in. Beautiful, fun, affordable, and ideally located.

Public Remarks: Located in the coveted Palm Haven neighborhood, this home has been thoughtfully remodeled to blend modern living upgrades while maintaining charm and history. Open floor plan with refinished hardwood flooring throughout, the kitchen has granite slab countertops, gas Viking stove, artisan tile and LED lighting. Custom built-in cabinets in the dining room are perfect for barware, dishware and extra seating. The spacious living room has crown molding, original alcove built in cabinets and an original Ernest Batchelder tile fireplace. The primary bedroom has a ensuite bathroom with beautiful porcelain tile floors. French doors open to the large covered deck with a hot tub. Access the quarter basement perfect for wine, storage and utilities. The beautiful backyard offers a fire pit, outdoor lighting, and a grass area for pets and play. The 160sf. of permitted space in the back is fully insulated with its own AC, its an ideal home office, 3rd bedroom or exercise space. Near water and drain lines, it could become an ADU! Landscaped with low maintenance and low water needs, the front yard has a mature fig and persimmon tree. Incredible location on a quiet tree lined street with stunning homes all around, close to parks, downtown Willow Glen with shopping, dining and schools.

Confidential Remarks: Disclosures at https://app.disclosures.io/link/633-Willow-Street-ddialjaf
Public Remarks: It does not get better than this. Come to indulge in this spacious, newly constructed, home located in everyone's favorite neighborhood, Willow Glen! This home features vaulted ceilings, new Adura luxury vinyl flooring throughout, and boasts four bedrooms (one downstairs) and three full bathrooms. The floor plan makes excellent use of the space, and the occupants are able to easily engage with each other while in the kitchen, family room and living room. There is a separate large dining room. The modern kitchen features a large peninsula with plenty of counter space for five people to comfortably eat and enjoy. The kitchen has Cherrywood cabinets and Granite countertops. The large primary bedroom features a walk-in closet, and the custom design has a separate soaking tub and walk in shower. The exterior has brand new paint, there is also a brand new composition shingle roof and double paned windows. The back yard is highlighted by a Gourmet BBQ Chef's outdoor kitchen. It features a high end built-in Alfresco 42 grill, power burner, sink, refrigerator, granite countertops and Four Grand Mere Wood Fired Oven. And lastly, let's not forget the Sunpower Solar Panel System (100% owned) purchased in 2018 that drastically reduces your electrical costs.

Public Remarks: Welcome to your dream home in the coveted Willow Glen neighborhood! Nestled on a picturesque tree-lined street, this stunning 4-brm, 2.5 bath residence offers the perfect blend of modern elegance & timeless charm. Step inside and be greeted by an inviting interior that showcases modern upgrades & thoughtful design. The heart of the home is the stunning kitchen with high-end finishes. Featuring sleek countertops, SS appliances & ample storage space. The spacious living area is flooded w/natural light, creating a bright and airy atmosphere. The primary suite is a true retreat, boasting a private ensuite bathroom w/jetted tub, oversized shower & a walk-in closet. Three additional well-appointed bedrooms. One of the highlights of this home is its prime location. With downtown Lincoln Ave just a stone's throw away, you'll have easy access to an array of shops, cafes & restaurants. Experience the vibrant community events & festivals that make Willow Glen a truly special place to call home

Public Remarks: Gorgeous remodeled home in beautiful tree-lined streets of Willow Glen, . Upgrades include engineered hardwood floors, remodeled kitchen with gas range, quartz countertops & garden window, remodeled baths, copper plumbing, newer & well-maintained HVAC A/C,recessed lighting, new Farro & Ball Paint, & top of the line Google Nest smoke/carbon Monoxide, Thermostat & security system, new sewer line w warranty and sprinkle system and drip lines in the private landscaping. Detached 425 sq ft former garage is now a beautiful bonus/auxiliary unit built by previous owner w SJ guideless that can become an ADU. No neighbor in the back due to a landlocked lot gives you privacy and yet walking distance to downtown Willow Glen restaurants and shops along with easy access to freeway.
